Action.author: rickr
Action.body: The Examples integration test are working just fine for exercising the APIs. User should read fabric documention that explains how to bet use private data. As stated here : https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-java/blob/57870235171105e5367fd619e1aa3c7fa7a1f7e6/docs/release_v1.2.0_notes.md#fab-9680-private-data-collection-support

Action.author: amolpednekar
Action.body: Updated issue to TASK, changed assigner to myself.
